pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("Test Tool 'HL7 v2 Syndromic Surveillance Reporting Validation Tool' is not valid");
pm.test("Adding Test Tool with invalid ID and valid Test Tool name to 2015 listing should give error in response", function () {
pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("contains an invalid test tool 'HL7 CDA Cancer Registry Reporting Validation Tool'");

request.description: Adding removed Test Tools to 2015 listing should give 400 status code and error in response

item.name: PUT /certified_products/{certifiedProductId} - 400 status and error for adding new/invalid Test Tools for 2014 listing

exec: pm.test("Adding new Test Tools to 2014 listing should give 400 status code and error in response", function () {
pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("Test Tool 'NIST General Validation Tool (GVT)' is not valid");
pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("Test Tool 'NCPDP Electronic Prescribing (eRx) Testing Tool' is not valid");
pm.test("Adding Test Tool with invalid ID and valid Test Tool name to 2014 listing should give error in response", function () {
pm.expect(pm.response.text()).to.include("invalid test tool 'HL7 CDA Cancer Registry Reporting Validation Tool'");
